results.name: default/wordpress-deployment-58996cdd8c-h2kgw

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: default/wordpress-service

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-deployment-58996cdd8c-h2kgw], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service can't find ready endpoints because the expected pod isn't ready.  
Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs [pod-name]`. 3. Verify pod readiness probe configuration. 4. Ensure required resources are available. 5. Restart pod if needed.
